thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 8 of 523
thread.title: Deb

author: Deb
title: Deb
text: My daughter found a dress on prom girl but I was reluctant to order it with the potential of it not fitting well, being of poor quality or dealing with the hassle of returning it. To my surprise, it fit so well all she needs is a gem. (Even with sizing being S, M, and L). The quality is decent. In this day and age when a prom dress is worn once, this is a great price. I am pleasantly surprised and satisfied and want others to know!
